      • initStateDependencies

        protected void initStateDependencies(IGameStateRenderer defaultRender,
                                     IGameStateInputHandler defaultInputHandler,
                                     IControlScheme defaultControlScheme,
                                     IControlHandler defaultControlHandler)
        Description copied from class: BaseGamestate
        Initializes the state dependencies. Override this method to pass custom state objects.

        If any state objects have been set before this call (ex. in the constructor), those will be passed here as parameters.

        This method will be called during BaseGamestate.injectDependencies(com.tokelon.toktales.tools.core.inject.parameter.IParameterInjector.IParameterInjectorFactory, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.integration.IGameStateIntegrator.IGameStateIntegratorFactory, com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.order.IRenderOrder, com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineContext, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.IGameStateInput, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene.IGameSceneControl.IGameSceneControlFactory, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.render.IGameStateRenderer, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.IGameStateInputHandler, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.IControlScheme, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.IControlHandler), after BaseGamestate.initBaseDependencies(com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineContext, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.IGameStateInput, javax.inject.Provider<? extends T>, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene.IGameSceneControl.IModifiableGameSceneControl<T>) and BaseGamestate.afterInitBaseDependencies(), so the context and any other injected objects will have their injected values.

        Overrides:
        initStateDependencies in class BaseGamestate<T extends IEngineGamescene>
        See Also:
        BaseGamestate.afterInitStateDependencies()

      • getSceneTypeClass

        public Class<? super T> getSceneTypeClass()
        Description copied from class: BaseGamestate
        Returns a class representing the raw type of this state's scenes.

        Use this if this state does not have a generic scene type or you don't care about the generic part.

        Overrides:
        getSceneTypeClass in class BaseGamestate<T extends IEngineGamescene>
